title: UI Polish: Subtle permission box styling

requirements.item: Restyle the permission prompt to feel like an inline card instead of a large modal.
Match the compact layout cues from the reference while staying more subtle.
Preserve existing permission actions and accessibility affordances.

e2eTests.name: Permission prompt layout
steps: Trigger a permission request in the UI.
Verify the prompt appears as an inline card with subdued shadow and lighter emphasis.
Confirm buttons are present and functional.

acceptanceCriteria.item: The permission box no longer reads as a large modal and feels visually subtle.
The prompt layout resembles the reference (card, title, command field, actions) but toned down.
